title: Which David foster Wallace books should I start with? - Quora

response.answer_text: Start with his essay collections — Consider the Lobster and A Supposedly Fun Thing I’ll Never Do Again are my specific recommendations. His essays are more accessible and personable than his novels or short stories. If you like what you find in his essays, then move onto his more literary works.

Start with Infinite Jest. If you finish it, keep reading DFW. If you do like I do and throw it against the wall, you can move on to someone else. Just kidding. I love his essays. Could never get through Infinite Jest though.
